availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Johnson Lewis (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Louisa Pennington Lewis on January 25, 1845 in Caldwell County, Kentucky. Father to Warren Lewis, William Lewis, Frank Lewis, and Marion Lewis. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 42.
Kentucky Marriage RecordsMadison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 12.
Find A Grave, "John Lewis (Jul. 24, 1821-May 30,1870)," Memorial #18581667, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/18581667(accessed April 4, 2020).
